OBLIGATIONS AND RIGHTS OF THE EXECUTOR OF A WILL
(1) Unless the testator determines otherwise, the duties of the executor of the will shall be above all to take care of the estate, manage it, take care of the payment of debts and legacies and generally ensure that the will is executed as the testator wished it to be.
(2) When there are more than one executors of a will, they shall jointly carry out the duties entrusted to them, unless the testator determined otherwise.
